metadata.dc:title: Tratamiento del cáncer prostático: acetato de medroxiprogesterona, dietilestilbestrol y acetato de ciproterona. Informe provisional de un estudio al azar del grupo cooperativo genito-urinario de la EORTC.
[Treatment of prostatic cancer: medroxyprogesterone acetate, diethylstilbestrol and cyproterone acetate. Provisional report of a random study by the genito-urinary cooperative group of the EORTC].
